p: The test group observed significant activity as compared to both the controls ( p < 0.001) until the end of the protocol, whereas with standard treatment. 5% hexane hydrogel showed significant activity until the 12th day ( p < 0.001) and day 13th day ( p < 0.01). Additionally, 10% of hexane hydrogel showed significant activity until the 12th day ( p < 0.001) and 13th day ( p < 0.05). Both the test groups of hexane hydrogel of M. oleifera seeds showed equal effectiveness until the end of the protocol.
